msbt.message: I don't know if I thanked you enough yesterday for all of your hard work, delivering for Santa. Did you know that my gift from him was an actual toy? It was adorable! And obviously perfect for Toy Day. It's also proof from one who knows that toys are for EVERYONE, not just children, .

Since you were nice enough to deliver my gift from Santa yesterday, I thought I might tell you about it! It was an actual toy, presumably made in the workshop by genuine elves, ! Let me tell you, I was giddy as a school, darling!<10_4 /> Elf toys!

Thank you again for your lovely gift yesterday. It meant the world to me.I hope you enjoyed my gift to you just as much—it came from the heart, darling. Well, the heart AND the wallet, to be quite honest, but that's part of the fun, !

It was wonderful exchanging gifts with you yesterday! Thank you again, . How lovely to have made such dear friends in rather a short time, when you really think about it. A tourism board would advertise us as ", where your future best friend already lives."

Tell me, after walking around and delivering gifts all day yesterday, are you exhausted today, ? No, you look like your usual, chipper self! I'm in awe, darling! I'm also in "awwwww" because you're adorable! What a friend to find me a delightful present AND give me the best Toy Day I can remember! Thank you.

Thank you again for exchanging gifts with me yesterday—yours was the best thing I received. But Santa did come close with that precious toy you delivered What a perfect Toy Day, . And it's not lost on me that the two best parts of yesterday both involved you. You just make everything better!
How was your Toy Day yesterday? Mine wasfine. Just a regular day, really. No big fuss, .
I dreamed about Santa Claus last night. His white beard was SO elegantly trimmed and coiffed. I know it was just a dream, but it was still a lovely way to spend Toy Day. I recommend it, .
